name: THE 4ROOMS

reviews.title: Perfect getaway for a few days in Porto
reviews.text: My wife and I had a fantastic stay at the 4rooms in Porto! The garden room is so quite and well designed, one feels at home the moment we arrived.

reviews.title: Coolest more-than-a-B&B ever!
reviews.text: The breakfast had always small surprises and has been the right start into the day.

reviews.title: Lovely guesthouse in beautiful Foz takes care of anything and everything you could want
reviews.text: Last but not least we've enjoyed our hosts, always helpful, always with good tips (e.g. having us picked up at the airport at midnight, helping us to rent nice bikes)

reviews.title: Boutique B & B with superb attention to detail in great neighborhood
reviews.text: Next time we are in Porto, we will return!

reviews.title: Wow! What a service and a gem!
reviews.text: It's definitely hard to add to the comments already written about 4Rooms but here goes....in short, this is unlike any place we have ever stayed! The house really is a home away from home and for anyone who loves design, it's the home that you wish you lived in! No detail goes unaccounted for and the house is only just a part of the unique experience of staying there. Antonio, Catarina, Paula go above and beyond and are encyclopedias of Porto (and the north) and the creative genius that exists there. As someone noted before...we did not want to leave and cannot wait to come back! And thank you all for a wonderful birthday! Nothing short of spectacular!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's hard not to repeat the wonderful comments about 4Rooms in Porto because it absolutely IS so wonderful! Catarina and Antonio were so friendly, informative and helpful with every part of our visit that by the time we left, we felt we were leaving old friends behind. The house and space are remarkable - from all the beautiful and thoughtful design details to the colors chosen. Breakfasts were always yummy! Our bed was a dream and we slept like babies! Location was A+++++! Loved the neighborhood and the friendly neighbors! Do use the Taxi service offered - it's worth every penny and made our arrival so easy and pleasant. The public transportation is only steps away and we learned very quickly how to get to every part of the city. The "seafood" restaurants were a real visual and culinary experience - again, perfection. Unforgettable is the perfect word for 4Rooms Porto! Thank you, Antonio, for creating such a perfect gem and thank you, Catarina, for making us feel like family! We did not want to leave!!!
reviews.title: A Hidden Gem in Porto, Portugal! Perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Every comment you read about 4Rooms is right on the money ! From the time we first contacted Catarina to inquire about booking 4Rooms, to the taxi she organized to pick us up at 4:00am to go to the airport, our experience at 4Rooms in Porto was tremendous. Their service and attention to detail is fantastic. We were upgraded to their new "Sky Loft", which is across the street from the main building......amazing and worth every penny. The breakfast each morning (the table is set up each evening in the loft and Catarina brings breakfast from the amazing restaurant they work with a few houses up the road each morning), couldn't have been any better. If there are any special food requirements, let them know and they will accomodate. The loft was fantastic......private entrance, sitting room, use of the Mac in the room, fantastic bathroom......not one flaw.
reviews.title: Amazing experience at 4Rooms in Porto !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The area 4Rooms is located (Foz) is a bit outside of Old Porto, but that was a good thing in our eyes. There's a classic tram only a 10 minute walk away that takes you into the old city & back and runs in the morning until approx. 9:00pm (2.50 each person each way). The buses are also convenient and a bit cheaper. Foz is a great area close to the beach, with many nice shops and restaurants. 4Rooms gave us some wonderful restaurant suggestions in the area (the restaurant they work with on the same street is a must) and we found a great sushi restaurant called Restaurante Ichiban.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were picked up at the main train station in Porto by a taxi organized by 4Rooms (you pay the taxi, but there are no surprises upon arrival.........taxis in Portugal often take advantage of tourists).
reviews.title: All the luxuries of a excellent hotel with a warm personal atention
Great city! Greatest hotel (kinda a B&B)
reviews.text: Katrina was the best! Hard to find and small, but like staying in a friends upscale home. A bit smallish room, but with all the ammenities, including a great breakfast. The restaurant that Katrina recomended was pricy but the best of two weeks of great meals. Most highly recomended.

reviews.title: Unlike anywhere we've been too!
reviews.text: We travelled to Porto for a city break. We wanted something that was no touristic, and a more authentic experience. Staying with Antonio and Catarina was unlike anything we have come across in our travels. Their customer service was really incredible - nothing was too much trouble, and they were forever coming up with new and interesting things to see and do (and best of all, delicious restaurants to go to). The property is small, but perfectly formed with lots of designer furniture (a real passion of Antonio's). We had such a good time, that we also managed to stay with them in their luxurious villa (with private pool) in the Algarve for a few days for our honeymoon (just got back). It is a new "project" that they're working on (based on the same ideals that made their Porto project so great). Antonio is keen to keep it a secret for now (as he develops the idea), but even at this early stage, it is pretty impossible to fault it (beautiful property, designer furniture, private pool and delicious food, all within minutes of he coast). If you get a chance, and loved Porto, then try and persuade Antonio to let you visit. It really is the most incredible experience.

reviews.title: Beyond Expectations
reviews.text: This place was absolutely incredible, it is actually completely faultless! We stayed here for 3 nights after we arrived in Porto from Australia and was the best choice that we ever made (except maybe staying a little longer!) Everything from our room being absolutely spotless, to the friendly staff just made our stay the best it could be. Whilst it is a little bit out of the main city centre, you get to experience a section of Porto that is beautiful and not very touristy. The apartment is located 2 mins from the beach and the river, and is also easy to get into the city by catching one of the frequent buses that takes 15 mins. The breakfast was also very yummy, and you get complimentory water all day long. I cannot recommend this place highly enough! It is definitely no. 1 for a reason!

reviews.title: Special kind of place
reviews.text: The tripadvisor rating says it all. It's easy to find a five star hotel nearer to porto center for much cheaper, but 4rooms is still worth the extra cost as it will give you a memorable experience. Everything was perfect, from the design to the food to the bed as well as the service offered.

reviews.title: Extraordinary experience
reviews.text: Me and my boyfrien have spent one night in Porto, sleeping at 4rooms. Courtesy, professionalism, culture, exceptional hospitality. Antonio and his staff are special people, the B&B is an extraordinary example of modern architecture and design (it has been designed by Eduardo Souto de Moura). This is one of the best places we have ever been, and I wish to thank Antonio and Catarina for the beautiful stay in Porto.

reviews.title: Deserving of it's number 1 rating
reviews.text: 4Rooms provided everything you need in a European city hotel: good location, top notch appointments and friendly and helpful staff.

reviews.title: Exceptional gem
reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, the B&B is well located on a quiet street in a locals neighborhood. Everything was walking, trolly or bus accessible from the location.

reviews.title: a different place to stay
reviews.text: Our suite was well thought out and beautifully designed. Everything was fresh, modern and immaculate. It is obvious the design was made by architects and that they furnished with first an attention to detail and quality decor. The breakfasts were fabulous!

reviews.title: Fantastic B&B
reviews.text: Caterina was warm and helpful and offered wonderful hospitality and guidance. Thanks!

reviews.title: Nice surprise in Porto!
reviews.text: This gem of a place is the perfect getaway for solo/couples or friends. The women that run the place, treat it like it's their own place and that you're an invited guest. The atmosphere of the decor is plush and fuctional. Location is very, very accessible to Porto and the restaurants aound Foz are among the best.

description: The 4Rooms is a stylish Bed & Breakfast located in a narrow, winding street of one of the most charming and fashionable Porto districts - the historical old Foz - where the Douro river meets the Atlantic Ocean.Bringing together history, tradition, attentiveness and architectural excellence this place was created to enjoy an unforgettable experience.It was designed by the internationally awarded architect Eduardo Souto de Moura, Pritzker Prize winner 2011, and it is catered for by the exquisit Restaurant Pedro Lemos, which provides all food and beverages served to our guests.Besides, we work with several more carefully selected partners in order to provide the most enjoyable products, amenities and services to our guests in Porto and around Portugal.
